price: alágbára, ẹni pàtàkì ní ọ̀dọ̀ Ẹni t’Ó ni Ìtẹ́-ọlá,
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
